specimenData.description: A list of all specimen data objects in the application

id.description: A unique identifier for the specimen used throughout the application.

name.description: The display name of this specimen. Does not need to be unique, though probably should be to avoid user confusion.

version.description: The current version of this specimen's asset bundles. Increment this to force clients to download new versions.

organ.description: The organ that this specimen represents. Should be defined below in the region list too.

assetUrl.description: The URL at which Windows users can download the asset bundles.

assetUrlWebGl.description: The URL at which WebGL users can download asset bundles.

assetUrlOsx.description: The URL at which MacOs users can download asset bundles.

prefabPath.description: The path within the bundle of the object prefab

scale.description: The scale factor of the given specimen in-app.

yPos.description: The local y-position of the given specimen in-app. Used to move the specimen up or down.

annotations.description: The annotations that will appear when the given specimen is selected

annotationId.description: A unique id, used throughout the app.

title.description: The title as it appears to users.

content.description: The content of the annotation. Can include rich media tags, like [img src='http://example.com/image.jpeg'] or [vid src='http://youtube.com/v1d30'

position.description: Either defines the relative position of the annotation, or defines the annotation as global (not positioned).

x.description: Number of scaled units on the given axis away from the center point of the specimen

y.description: Number of scaled units on the given axis away from the center point of the specimen

z.description: Number of scaled units on the given axis away from the center point of the specimen

global.description: If true, should ignore any position info in x, y, z.

labs.description: A list of all labs in the application.

labId.description: The unique id for the lab.

labName.description: The display name of the lab.

imgUrl.description: An url to an image for the lab background

specimenList.description: A list of strings matching unique ids from specimens in the specimenData list

items.title: id
items.description: Must match a unique specimen id.

regions.description: Defines regions and their sub-organs for menu organization in-app.

name.description: The display name of the region for menus.

organs.description: Defines the organs that are within the given region. Should match organs as written in specimen data.

items.title: organ
items.description: A string representing an organ that is within the given region.
